mapper.select: select Q.question_no, Q.member_code, Q.question_title, Q.question_original_filename, Q.question_renamed_filename, substr(Q.question_date,1,10) question_date, Q.question_open, substr(M.member_name, 1,1)||'*'|| substr(M.member_name, -1,1) member_name from member M join question_board Q on M.member_code = Q.member_code order by question_no
select count(*) from member M join question_board Q on M.member_code = Q.member_code where M.member_code = Q.member_code

select Q.question_no, M.member_name, Q.member_code, Q.question_title, Q.question_original_filename, Q.question_renamed_filename, substr(Q.question_date,1,10) question_date, Q.question_open, Q.question_content from member M join question_board Q on M.member_code = Q.member_code where question_no = #{questionNo} order by question_no
mapper.insert:
insert into question_board(question_no, member_code, question_title, question_content, question_original_filename, question_renamed_filename , question_date, question_open) values(seq_question_board.nextval, #{memberCode}, #{questionTitle}, #{questionContent}, #{questionOriginalFilename}, #{questionRenamedFilename} , sysdate, #{questionOpen})
select seq_question_board.currval from dual
